* Zyber watched Rowdy gallop off towards his den, her eyes glued to him until he disappeared beyond a bend.
Not sure if she was to follow or head back towards her own den she simply sat where she was, contemplating what to do next.
A small smile creased her wolfin mouth as she heard her stomach growl, then knowing what she had to do next�eat!
Zyber took in a deep breath and took in the night air; it smelling sweet to her senses as she then got to her feet.
It was just the right time to go hunting but it was also just the right time to follow after a friend and give him some company, simply walking after then striding after her fellow wolf.
She had gone to his den to visit and she was planning to do so, it being a bit rude not to finish what she had started.
Zyber ran after Rowdy still had the slight smile on her face, her wolf senses alive with the night air ruffling through her fur.
She opened her com-link to him, hoping that he still wanted company. Her own den not all that far away if he did not. *

� I hope that I am still welcome to accompany you to you home?�
